title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3181/88 of 17 October 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1481/86 on the determination of prices of fresh or chilled sheep carcases on representative Community markets and the survey of prices of certain other qualities of sheep carcases in the Community
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3181/88
of 17 October 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1481/86 on the determination of prices of fresh or chilled sheep carcases on representative Community markets and the survey of prices of certain other qualities of sheep carcases in the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Point C in Annex II to Regulation (EEC) No 1481/86 is replaced by point C in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 November 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 October 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 183, 16. 7. 1980, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 110, 29. 4. 1988, p. 36.
(3) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1986, p. 12.
(4) OJ No L 52, 26. 2. 1988, p. 20.
ANNEX
'C. FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF GERMANY
1. Representative market: Federal Republic of Germany
The prices recorded on this market are the weighted average of the recoded in the following regions:
1.2 //  // Weighting coefficients   // Bayern   // 17,3 %  // Niedersachsen   // 4,3 %   // Nordrhein-Westfalen   // 55,9 %   // Saarland   // 2,2 %   // Schleswig-Holstein   // 20,3 %  // 2. Category   //   // Mastlammfleisch   // 100 %'
